mapper.sql: KEYWORD_ID AS 'keywordId', SYSTEM_POSITION AS 'systemPosition', CUSTOMER_POSITION AS 'customerPosition', SEARCH_ENGINE AS 'searchEngine', TERMINAL_TYPE AS 'terminalType', TODAY_FEE AS 'todayFee', RECORD_DATE AS 'recordDate'
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO cms_keyword_position_history(KEYWORD_ID, SYSTEM_POSITION, SEARCH_ENGINE, TERMINAL_TYPE, TODAY_FEE, RECORD_DATE) VALUES ( #{positionHistory.id}, #{positionHistory.currentPosition}, #{positionHistory.searchEngine}, #{positionHistory.terminalType}, #{positionHistory.todayFee}, #{positionHistory.currentDate} )
